item.title: about_template_1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM
First Bitcoin Deals Started
Digital “wallets” are used to store Bitcoin until you are ready to spend them or exchange them for another currency. Wallets range in terms of features and platforms. March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM
Exchange Rates Have Rosen
Exchanges accept a variety of payment options based on what they are willing to use. Some payment methods have been used to scam sellers for a quick buck. March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM
Bitcoin Hits Records
The price of bitcoin BTCUSD, +4.26% moved from below $7,000 to above $8,000 shortly after 7 a.m. Thursday, bitcoins exchanged hands than in any other 60-minute period. March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM

We’re seeking an expert in Finance and online business.
Job Description
Have outstanding interpersonal skills displayed by a strong pattern of leadership, have a keen interest in Leverage Finance
Job Specification
Qualitative credentials will weigh meaningfully in the selection of the candidate. Interested candidates meeting the above criteria are requested to send their updated Cv via email carrear@domain.com within 10th May 2019 Apply Now! Apply Now!

item.content:encoded: Review. Network Brand-new pre-Ico, that will launch own cryptocurrency exchange with options. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. Network Created for better financial ecosytem, and for increased cometition. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. Network Alternative energy market didn’t have its cryptocurrency yet. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. Network Using cryptocurrency for provided services and consultancy in different spheres. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. Network Absolutely new and fresh Pre-Ico project for better understanding of cryptocurrency. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. Network Perfect match for those who want to invest in businessed with cryptocurrency. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. Network Alternative energy market didn’t have its cryptocurrency yet. Start: September 12,2018 End: September 31,2018 Review. item.title: careers_tab2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We need a Finance Analyst who wants to start career in Finance sphere.
Responsibilities
Assist the Director of FP&A in supporting Executive Management with timely and effective financial analysis and reporting.
Job Specification
Monthly consolidation, analysis, and publication of regional financial results and forecasts, internal and external reporting. Interested candidates meeting the above criteria are requested to send their updated Cv via email carrear@domain.com within 10th May 2019 Apply Now! Apply Now!

Description

Before you start using Ripple for any serious transaction, be sure to read what you need to know and take appropriate steps to secure your wallet. Always remember that it is your responsibility to choose your wallet carefully and adopt good practices in order to protect your money.

Android – Android is extremely popular system and this app allowing send/receive Bitcoin Cash.

iOS – iPhones are used by the majority of people. This app made for iOS is perfect for bitcoins.

Linux – if you use Linux system, you can easily download this app to manage bitcoins.

Bitcoins can be bought from various sources. You can purchase them online using an exchange or brokerage service that will enable you to buy Bitcoin with a bank transfer.

item.title: temp1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Primarily this would be the first thought of most people especially those who are not familiar with the currently existing digital currencies. However, if you are someone who’s knowledgeable enough with regards to cryptocurrencies, even with your eyes closed, for sure you can answer the question very well.
  • Edit
As might be, the definite beginning of chaos happened by the time Bitcoin was made known globally, for which it sooner or later became the most wanted and prominent cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of this project was to address the constant complains of people whose properties and money are controlled by only one centralized unit (which most of the time the government intervened also).
  • Edit
  • Edit
With the Bitcoin’s emergence, several people had the choice to obtain a digital currency.However, obtaining this type of money really requires resources and is exhausting, still several people were amazed to it right from the beginning since a lot of people wanted to stop a single entity monopolizing.
  • Edit
  • Edit

Obtaining Money

  • Edit
Gradually, Bitcoin begun to obtain real monetary value and several new kinds of cryptocurrencies have emerged slowly to existence to address the imposed Bitcoin problems.
  • Edit
  • Edit
  • Edit
Even though cryptocurrency wasn’t readily accepted generally, it gradually developed its momentum and presently, several other business establishments even allow it as a method of exchange or payment. This is also happening gradually to new cryptocurrencies. Even though it is run by a free-source software and the profitability isn’t guaranteed, several people still attempt to strive to obtain these cryptocurrencies as additional form of investment. We will never know, but maybe someday even the fiat money can vanish for good.

We will never know, but maybe someday even the fiat money can vanish for good.\n","jet_tricks_widget_satellite_text":"Lorem Ipsum","jet_tricks_widget_tooltip_description":"Lorem Ipsum","jet_tricks_widget_satellite_image":{"id":2011,"url":"http://ld-wp.template-help.com/bitunet/skin-1\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/09\/placeholder.png"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9uOETcuFjbE

How does it work?

Bitcoin’s rate is so rapidly changing that miners’ wealth is either rising or falling several times a day. calculate your ASIC cost price use Bitcoin calculator. We help to invest in cryptocurrencies We provide CO consulting and Digital Currencies Buy Token Buy Token

What is Bitcoin?

Bitcoin’s mission is providing people with universal currency. There are pros of using bitcoin

Bearer Ecash

Replacing common currency is one of Bitcoin’s main features.

Fungibility

I is a basic attribute of any money, Bitcoin added new features to its meaning.

Privacy

It allows to survive due to its utility in black and grey market use cases.

No Permission

The permissionless nature of Bitcoin is a key selling point in the eyes of developers

Easy-to-use

Using Bitcoin according to your desire will be full with one of digital wallets.

Proved

Bitcoin is already proved in cryptocurrency world. It made a revolution in finance sphere.

Want to invest in cryptocurrencies?

Our team will help you to operate on instant exchange to trade bitcoins successfully. We will teach you the basis of trading. Buy Token Buy Token

Our Teamship

Our professional and experienced staff works for you Albert Green

Expert in strategy and business analytics

John Mall

Head of Marketing Department

Alex Nilson

Head of Finance Department

Mark Mann

Currency Exchange Consultor

Fast Responders

Move seamlessly between currencies and pay anyone globally, using the world's fastest payment network. Bitunet is the place where everyone will benefit!

Buy Token Buy Token

How does it work?

Hedge your bitcoin against major currencies for the peace of mind that you won't be affected by bitcoin price fluctuations. Trade confidently in real-time with a blended exchange rate. 0 + Projects Consulted 0 + Cases Completed 0 + New Residents 0 + Transactions Daily

Roadmap

March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM
First Bitcoin Deals Started
Digital “wallets” are used to store Bitcoin until you are ready to spend them or exchange them for another currency. Wallets range in terms of features and platforms. March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM
Exchange Rates Have Rosen
Exchanges accept a variety of payment options based on what they are willing to use. Some payment methods have been used to scam sellers for a quick buck. March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM March 2018 Monday, 12:05 AM

item.title: Team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Teamship

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Albert GreenChief Finance Officer

Knows everything and even more about Bitcoin

Mark StinsonMarket Researcher

Follows up on market trends and novelties

Stan SandersBitcoin Brocker

Will help you to make a deal with Bitcoins

Derek MillsBitcoin Analyst

In charge of analyzing the current market trends

Patrick RodsFinancial Consultant

Good at Finance and Exchange Rates

Tim MaddockSenior Brocker

Works with top Stock Exchange

Ann HolesBusiness Consultant

Provides competent cosultations in business

Nina GreenHead Financier

On guard of all finance and transactions

Want to invest in cryptocurrencies?

Our team will help you to operate on instant exchange to trade bitcoins successfully. We will teach you the basis of trading. Make An Apointment Make An Apointment

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Bitcoin Services

Today Bitcoin competes for primacy with gold and top world’s currencies. It has already overturned people’s attitude to currency.

01

You are able to buy bitcoin via an online exchange.

Download a Wallet

03

You need to link your credit card or bank account to the wallet

Buy Bitcoin

02

You have an opportunity to spend bitcoins on electronics, etc.

Use Bitcoin

04

Fair gaming for cryptocurrency enthusiasts will appreciate it.

Play Games

Main Benefits

Bitcoins are completely virtual coins designed to be ‘self-contained’ for their value, with no need for banks to move and store the money.

High Speed

Operate with your cryptocurrency on the fly! Low costs and easy access to database let everyone start earning!

Fair Deals Only

Open-source smart contract ensures fair and transparent deals between merchants and affiliates.

Hacking Protection

All user accounts are independent; if one account is hacked, this won’t breach the security of.

Cost Effective

Follow up on price changes online and be ready to make decisions regarding your cryptocurrency funds.

Real-Time Database

Have an access to database 24/7 and manage your funds online! Earn more in real time mode!

No Middle Men

Smart contracts autonomously perform funding – collect and release payments.

How to by Tokens

Want to operate with cryptocurrency? Check our pricing plans to select the best option for you!

Basic Sale

April 23, 2018

1 ETH = up to 41,000 STMX up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus 150.000.000 STMX Buy Now!

Premium Sale

April 23, 2018

1 ETH = up to 41,000 STMX up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus 150.000.000 STMX Buy Now!

Gold Sale

April 23, 2018

1 ETH = up to 41,000 STMX up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus 150.000.000 STMX Buy Now!

Want to invest in cryptocurrencies?

Our team will help you to operate on instant exchange to trade bitcoins successfully. We will teach you the basis of trading. Buy Token Buy Token

item.title: Single Service Layout 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Here you can easily download your Bitcoin Wallet for free! Download it right to your device for comfortable and secure access to your bitcoins:

Download a Wallet
  • Android - app allowing send/receive Bitcoin Cash;
  • iOS - app made for iOS to operate with bitcoins;
  • Linux - app for Linux users to manage bitcoins.
Buy Now! Buy Now!

How to by Tokens

Want to operate with cryptocurrency? Check our pricing plans to select the best option for you!

Basic Sale

April 23, 2018

1 ETH = up to 41,000 STMX up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus 150.000.000 STMX Buy Now!

Premium Sale

April 23, 2018

1 ETH = up to 41,000 STMX up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus 150.000.000 STMX Buy Now!

Gold Sale

April 23, 2018

1 ETH = up to 41,000 STMX up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus up to 39% bonus 150.000.000 STMX Buy Now!

How does it work?

Opendime is a small USB Stick that allows you to spend Bitcoin like a dollar bill. Pass it along multiple times. Connect to any USB to check balance. Unseal anytime to spend online.

The 1st Bitcoin Bearer Bond or just call it a "Bitcoin Stick".
Trust no one.

  • USB Drive
  • Ultra Secure
  • Compatibility
  • Free to Use
  • Open Standards
  • No Trust
Buy Token Buy Token [visualizer id="9"]

Quick Learning Events

For those who want to learn more about trading!

Cryptocurrency - Who Are Involved With It?

12Jun

  • Conference Center
  • Thursday, 2PM to 4PM
Theresa BarnesSpeaker, Business woman

Risks & Rewards Of Investing In Bitcoin

12Jun

  • Conference Center
  • Thursday, 2PM to 4PM
Theresa BarnesSpeaker, Business woman

Bitcoin vs. Bitcoin Cash: What's the Difference?

12Jun

  • Conference Center
  • Thursday, 2PM to 4PM
Theresa BarnesSpeaker, Business woman

Want to invest in cryptocurrencies?

Our team will help you to operate on instant exchange to trade bitcoins successfully. We will teach you the basis of trading. Buy Token Buy Token

item.title: Single Service Layout 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Before you start using Bitcoin for any serious transaction, be sure to read what you need to know and take appropriate steps to secure your wallet. Always remember that it is your responsibility to choose your wallet carefully and adopt good practices in order to protect your money.

Bitcoin Wallets
Here you can easily download your Bitcoin Wallet for free! Download it right to your device for comfortable and secure access to your bitcoins.
  • Android - Android is extremely popular system and this app allowing send/receive Bitcoin Cash.
  • iOS - iPhones are used by the majority of people. This app made for iOS is perfect for bitcoins.
  • Linux - if you use Linux system, you can easily download this app to manage bitcoins.
Read More Read More

Distibution of Tokens

STMX Coin is a platform for the future of funding that is built on top of the Ethereum blockchain. [visualizer id="1301"]Projects Consulted ServicesProjects Consulted ServicesProjects Consulted ServicesProjects Consulted ServicesProjects Consulted Services

Frequently Asked Questions

We gathered the most popular questions here. Anyone can check and lear nmore about Bitcoins.

Q.Advisory services and Market expertise – Blockchain Strategy?
A. At Bitunet, any user can be a borrower or a lender. When a borrower requests a bitcoin loan, the platform matches the borrower with a lender.
Q.Blockchain Strategy – Expertise as a service for critical decisions?
A. At Bitunet, any user can be a borrower or a lender. When a borrower requests a bitcoin loan, the platform matches the borrower with a lender.
Q.Development – Automated market-making tool, leveraging third-party liquidity sources?
A. At Bitunet, any user can be a borrower or a lender. When a borrower requests a bitcoin loan, the platform matches the borrower with a lender.

How can we help you?

We’re happy to answer all your questions about Cryptocurrency and Finance.

item.title: Bitcoin vs. Bitcoin Cash: What's the Difference?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Primarily this would be the first thought of most people especially those who are not familiar with the currently existing digital currencies. However, if you are someone who’s knowledgeable enough with regards to cryptocurrencies, even with your eyes closed, for sure you can answer the question very well. As might be, the definite beginning of chaos happened by the time Bitcoin was made known globally, for which it sooner or later became the most wanted and prominent cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of this project was to address the constant complains of people whose properties and money are controlled by only one centralized unit (which most of the time the government intervened also). With the Bitcoin’s emergence, several people had the choice to obtain a digital currency.However, obtaining this type of money really requires resources and is exhausting, still several people were amazed to it right from the beginning since a lot of people wanted to stop a single entity monopolizing.

Obtaining Money

Gradually, Bitcoin begun to obtain real monetary value and several new kinds of cryptocurrencies have emerged slowly to existence to address the imposed Bitcoin problems. Even though cryptocurrency wasn’t readily accepted generally, it gradually developed its momentum and presently, several other business establishments even allow it as a method of exchange or payment. This is also happening gradually to new cryptocurrencies. Even though it is run by a free-source software and the profitability isn’t guaranteed, several people still attempt to strive to obtain these cryptocurrencies as additional form of investment. We will never know, but maybe someday even the fiat money can vanish for good.
item.excerpt:encoded: Bitcoin, it seems, is everywhere. It’s in the news. It’s on phones. It’s even available at ATMs across the globe. Its fast rate of growth and adoption are attracting a lot of attention. And like any interesting, fast-growing business, it is attracting the interest of investors. All of which leads to the question, since Bitcoin is not a company …

item.title: 3 Reasons Bitcoin Has Rallied Above $700
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Primarily this would be the first thought of most people especially those who are not familiar with the currently existing digital currencies. However, if you are someone who’s knowledgeable enough with regards to cryptocurrencies, even with your eyes closed, for sure you can answer the question very well. As might be, the definite beginning of chaos happened by the time Bitcoin was made known globally, for which it sooner or later became the most wanted and prominent cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of this project was to address the constant complains of people whose properties and money are controlled by only one centralized unit (which most of the time the government intervened also). With the Bitcoin’s emergence, several people had the choice to obtain a digital currency.However, obtaining this type of money really requires resources and is exhausting, still several people were amazed to it right from the beginning since a lot of people wanted to stop a single entity monopolizing.

Obtaining Money

Gradually, Bitcoin begun to obtain real monetary value and several new kinds of cryptocurrencies have emerged slowly to existence to address the imposed Bitcoin problems. Even though cryptocurrency wasn’t readily accepted generally, it gradually developed its momentum and presently, several other business establishments even allow it as a method of exchange or payment. This is also happening gradually to new cryptocurrencies. Even though it is run by a free-source software and the profitability isn’t guaranteed, several people still attempt to strive to obtain these cryptocurrencies as additional form of investment. We will never know, but maybe someday even the fiat money can vanish for good.
item.excerpt:encoded: Since its inception, there have been questions surrounding Bitcoin’s ability to scale effectively. Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency that exists within network of computers, within the blockchain. This is revolutionary ledger-recording technology. It makes ledgers far more difficult to manipulate for a couple reasons.

item.title: Single Case
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
01. Stock Exchange

Blockchain technology proponents believe it can be used to create secure and convenient alternatives to time-consuming and expensive banking processes. And this theory seems to be gaining traction, around the world. Token sales, or Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs).
Pellentesque scelerisque a nisl a imperdiet. Vivamus vulputate blandit risus, ac tempor ortor dictum eget efficitur sit amet nisl.

Challenge

While WeExchange functioned as a bitcoin wallet service and an exchange platform, BitFunder operated as a crypto stock exchange enabling users to purchase and trade.
  • Coinbase
Coinbase has emerged as one of the high profile names in the Bitcoin world placing itself on the top as a one stop solution for Bitcoins.
  • Bitfinex
Bitfinex is a platform providing advanced trading tools like margin trading, short selling and liquidity swaps to buy or sell Bitcoins, Litecoins and Darkcoins.
  • Cryptsy
Cryptsy is a platform not only for Bitcoins, but also the variants which are collectively called altcoins. The exchange is headquartered in Florida.

Solution

Being able to purchase Bitcoin is the initial step to trading in it. Just like trading a stock, Bitcoin exchanges charge transaction fees, which range from 0 to 1%. In order to trade Bitcoin on an exchange, the user needs to have an account, and go through a series of steps.

A good place to start is to look at the virtual coins which are supported by an exchange. With over 4,000 cryptocurrencies, and additional ones being added all the time, it is key to figure out which currencies you want to trade in, and then match the exchange that deals in those. .

Results

Desirable security features include two-factor authentication, SMS or email alerts, encrypted emails, and wallet monitoring. A smartphone app can also be very useful in terms of monitoring funds – but, poorly implemented software can represent a security risk.
  • Streamlined interface
  • Wide currency support
  • Insurance protection available
  • Bitcoin$6,519.74-0.03%

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Contact Us

We Are Happy to Meet You in Our Offices!

Headquarter 1

We welcome you in our head office in Miami! Rebecca Teenadministration
  • +3 8940 353 3452 5828+3 8940 353 3452 5828
  • bitunet@crryptocurency.com
  • 7292 Dictum Av. San Antonio MI 47096

Headquarter 2

If you are in NY, we welcome you in our office! Amanda Greenadministration
  • +3 8940 353 3452 5828+3 8940 353 3452 5828
  • bitunet@crryptocurency.com
  • 7292 Dictum Av. San Antonio MI 47096

Headquarter 3

Our Canadian office welcomes you in Toronto! Oliver Whiteadministration
  • +3 8940 353 3452 5828+3 8940 353 3452 5828
  • bitunet@crryptocurency.com
  • 7292 Dictum Av. San Antonio MI 47096

item.title: Pre-Sale Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Number of Token Sales Keeps Rising

Let’s get some basic economics out of the way: in order for the token value to increase there has to be more demand for it than there is as a supply.
  • Positioning - we do benchmarking
  • Roadshow - we organize private investor
Whitepaper Whitepaper
Pre-Sale Start:
00 Days 00 Hours 00 Minutes 00 Seconds Raised: $42,906.50 0%
Softcap in 2458 days

ICOX token

How does it work?

Opendime is a small USB Stick that allows you to spend Bitcoin like a dollar bill. Pass it along multiple times. Connect to any USB to check balance. Unseal anytime to spend online.

The 1st Bitcoin Bearer Bond or just call it a "Bitcoin Stick".
Trust no one.

  • Convert any amount
  • World currencies
  • Track transactions
  • Bitcoin rates
  • Exchange rates
  • Easy-to-use

item.title: Pre-Ico Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Pre ICOs

Use our pre ICO list to find the best pre-ICOs. A pre-ICO allows investors to buy tokens before the official crowdsale begins. In most cases, these pre-ICOs raise a much smaller amount of money, and offer tokens at a lower price with a substantial bonus. Finding a pre-ICO with a bonus of 40% or more compared to the ICO price is not all that uncommon (exciting right!) Top PicksPre ICOsActive ICOsUpcoming ICOs

item.title: Cryptword
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Cryptocurrency Created for better financial ecosytem, and for increased competition in micro and macro economy. Start: September 12,2018 Review Review

What is Review.network about?

Cryptoworld is about directly connecting companies and consumers. Cryptoworld Pre-Ico transforms the way companies do market research.
Pre-ICO is slightly a unique phenomenon within the crypto industry. Basically, for presale, companies are using different smart contracts in compare with an main sale.

Strenghts

If you are launching a new project and going to conduct your own ICO, you can easily send us a request to list your future ICO at ICOguru.
  • Easy to Make Money on Pre-Ico
Sometimes, projects are launching Pre-ICOs with the main goal to detect an overall interest in their project.
  • Additional Benefits
Pre-ICOs funds can be used for financing of the expenses incurred on launching the main stage of an ICO.
  • Tradable on different exchanges
Using this algorithm, they make substantial profits whiles the value of the project token subsequently takes a downward hit.[visualizer id="9"]

Information

Created by competend and experienced financier Tom Peters in 2015.
Token:REW
Price:$1.00
Soft Cap:$3 500 000.00
Hard Cap:$
Valuation:$0.00
Platform:Ethereum
Buy With:ETH, BTC, LTC, BCH, Fiat during pre-sale

Restrictions

Africa South America are under restrictions because of their banking system..
KYC:KYC Required

item.title: Crowd-sale
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Crowdsale 
Do not miss your chance.

Offering the most popular and proven Pre-Icos for any occasion and for any industry. Learn more about various offers:
  • Positioning - we do benchmarking
  • Roadshow - we organize private investor
Whitepaper Whitepaper
Pre-Sale Start:
00 Days 00 Hours 00 Minutes 00 Seconds Raised: $42,906.50 0%
Softcap in 2458 days
Buy Token Buy Token
Review. Network
Brand-new pre-Ico, that will launch own cryptocurrency exchange with options. Buy Now Buy Now
Cryptocurrency
Created for better financial ecosytem, and for increased competition and in micro and macro economy. Buy Now Buy Now
Consultancy
Using cryptocurrency for provided services and consultancy in different spheres. Buy Now Buy Now
Alternative
Alternative energy market didn’t have its cryptocurrency yet, but with Energia the new age has come. Buy Now Buy Now
Cryptocurrecny
Absolutely new and fresh Pre-Ico project for better understanding of cryptocurrency. Buy Now Buy Now
Investment
Perfect match for those who want to invest in businessed with cryptocurrency. Buy Now Buy Now

Want to invest in cryptocurrencies?

Our team will help you to operate on instant exchange to trade bitcoins successfully. We will teach you the basis of trading. Buy Token Buy Token

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection. An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year. If you have an account and you log in to this site, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser. When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed. If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue. For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Risks & Rewards Of Investing In Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Primarily this would be the first thought of most people especially those who are not familiar with the currently existing digital currencies. However, if you are someone who’s knowledgeable enough with regards to cryptocurrencies, even with your eyes closed, for sure you can answer the question very well. As might be, the definite beginning of chaos happened by the time Bitcoin was made known globally, for which it sooner or later became the most wanted and prominent cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of this project was to address the constant complains of people whose properties and money are controlled by only one centralized unit (which most of the time the government intervened also). With the Bitcoin’s emergence, several people had the choice to obtain a digital currency.However, obtaining this type of money really requires resources and is exhausting, still several people were amazed to it right from the beginning since a lot of people wanted to stop a single entity monopolizing.

Obtaining Money

Gradually, Bitcoin begun to obtain real monetary value and several new kinds of cryptocurrencies have emerged slowly to existence to address the imposed Bitcoin problems. Even though cryptocurrency wasn’t readily accepted generally, it gradually developed its momentum and presently, several other business establishments even allow it as a method of exchange or payment. This is also happening gradually to new cryptocurrencies. Even though it is run by a free-source software and the profitability isn’t guaranteed, several people still attempt to strive to obtain these cryptocurrencies as additional form of investment. We will never know, but maybe someday even the fiat money can vanish for good.
item.excerpt:encoded: Recently, the price of the digital currency, Bitcoin, has risen to above $700, a multi-month high. In fact, Bitcoin is up around 16% over the past 30 days and up 62% year to date - making it the second best performing currency asset of the year so far, behind Ether, another digital currency based on blockchain technology.

item.title: Cryptocurrency - Who Are Involved With It?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Primarily this would be the first thought of most people especially those who are not familiar with the currently existing digital currencies. However, if you are someone who’s knowledgeable enough with regards to cryptocurrencies, even with your eyes closed, for sure you can answer the question very well. As might be, the definite beginning of chaos happened by the time Bitcoin was made known globally, for which it sooner or later became the most wanted and prominent cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of this project was to address the constant complains of people whose properties and money are controlled by only one centralized unit (which most of the time the government intervened also). With the Bitcoin’s emergence, several people had the choice to obtain a digital currency.However, obtaining this type of money really requires resources and is exhausting, still several people were amazed to it right from the beginning since a lot of people wanted to stop a single entity monopolizing.

Obtaining Money

Gradually, Bitcoin begun to obtain real monetary value and several new kinds of cryptocurrencies have emerged slowly to existence to address the imposed Bitcoin problems. Even though cryptocurrency wasn’t readily accepted generally, it gradually developed its momentum and presently, several other business establishments even allow it as a method of exchange or payment. This is also happening gradually to new cryptocurrencies. Even though it is run by a free-source software and the profitability isn’t guaranteed, several people still attempt to strive to obtain these cryptocurrencies as additional form of investment. We will never know, but maybe someday even the fiat money can vanish for good.
item.excerpt:encoded: Bitcoin, it seems, is everywhere. It’s in the news. It’s on phones. It’s even available at ATMs across the globe. Its fast rate of growth and adoption are attracting a lot of attention. And like any interesting, fast-growing business, it is attracting the interest of investors. All of which leads to the question, since Bitcoin is not a company …

item.title: How Cryptocurrency Begun and Its Impact To Financial Transactions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Primarily this would be the first thought of most people especially those who are not familiar with the currently existing digital currencies. However, if you are someone who’s knowledgeable enough with regards to cryptocurrencies, even with your eyes closed, for sure you can answer the question very well. As might be, the definite beginning of chaos happened by the time Bitcoin was made known globally, for which it sooner or later became the most wanted and prominent cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of this project was to address the constant complains of people whose properties and money are controlled by only one centralized unit (which most of the time the government intervened also). With the Bitcoin’s emergence, several people had the choice to obtain a digital currency.However, obtaining this type of money really requires resources and is exhausting, still several people were amazed to it right from the beginning since a lot of people wanted to stop a single entity monopolizing.

Gradually, Bitcoin begun to obtain real monetary value and several new kinds of cryptocurrencies have emerged slowly to existence to address the imposed Bitcoin problems. Even though cryptocurrency wasn’t readily accepted generally, it gradually developed its momentum and presently, several other business establishments even allow it as a method of exchange or payment. This is also happening gradually to new cryptocurrencies. Even though it is run by a free-source software and the profitability isn’t guaranteed, several people still attempt to strive to obtain these cryptocurrencies as additional form of investment. item.title: ICOX
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
<!--(figmeta)eyJmaWxlS2V5IjoiamZUQ2txeHo2RHZBbzU2OTBTcFhCSSIsInBhc3RlSUQiOjk2MzM3OTM3MSwiZGF0YVR5cGUiOiJzY2VuZSJ9Cg==(/figmeta)--><!--(figma)(/figma)-->Before you start using Bitcoin for any serious transaction, be sure to read what you need to know and take appropriate steps to secure your wallet. Always remember that it is your responsibility to choose your wallet carefully and adopt good practices in order to protect your money.
<!--(figmeta)eyJmaWxlS2V5IjoiamZUQ2txeHo2RHZBbzU2OTBTcFhCSSIsInBhc3RlSUQiOjEwMzYzMzQxOSwiZGF0YVR5cGUiOiJzY2VuZSJ9Cg==(/figmeta)--><!--(figma)(/figma)-->Android <!--(figmeta)eyJmaWxlS2V5IjoiamZUQ2txeHo2RHZBbzU2OTBTcFhCSSIsInBhc3RlSUQiOjg5NTg4NDE2MSwiZGF0YVR5cGUiOiJzY2VuZSJ9Cg==(/figmeta)--><!--(figma)(/figma)-->- Android is extremely popular system and this app allowing send/receive Bitcoin Cash.

Before you start using Ripple for any serious transaction, be sure to read what you need to know and take appropriate steps to secure your wallet. Always remember that it is your responsibility to choose your wallet carefully and adopt good practices in order to protect your money.
